descript.abstract: This polygon dataset represents metropolitan organization areas in the United States of America. United States Metropolitan Planning Organization database is a geographic database of Metropolitan Planning Organization political boundaries.
descript.purpose: This dataset is intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production, or to provide a basemap to support graphical overlays and analysis with other spatial data.

dataqual.logic: All node-link and polygon topological relationships were created and verified using ESRI ArcGIS 9.1

citeinfo.origin: Federal Highway Administration, Office of Planning, Environment, & Realty
Research and Innovative Technology Administration's Bureau of Transportation Statistics
citeinfo.title: MPOs

pubinfo.publish: Research and Innovative Technology Administration's Bureau of Transportation Statistics (RITA/BTS)

srcinfo.srccontr: MPOs, state DOTs, and other government agencies

procstep.procdesc: Data for individual MPOs were collected from the MPOs, state DOTs, and other government agencies. Data were received in a variety of geospatial data formats. The Federal Highway Administration and BTS collected the individual MPO files, digitized raster images where necessary and reformatted geospatial data files to fit into a national database. Data collected from the above-listed agencies was not edited or altered in any way. If you have questions about the process steps for particular MPOs or regions, please contact BTS.

cntorgp.cntorg: Federal Highway Administration, Office of Planning, Environment, & Realty

cntinfo.cntpos: Travel Demand Forecasting and GIS Specialist

procstep.procdesc: In order to meet Tufts University's metadata standards: >Changed name of file from "mpo" to "USAmetroPlanOrg11" >Changed citatition title from "Metropolitan Political Organization" to "Metropolitan Planning Organization Areas USA 2011" >Changed access contraints from "None." to "Unrestricted Access Online" >Changed originators/publishers from "Research and Innovative Technology Administration's Bureau of Transportation Statistics" to "United States. Bureau of Transportation Statistics. Office of Geographic Information Services" >Changed originator from "Federal Highway Administration" to "United States. Federal Highway Administration" >Changed publication place to reflect LCNH formatting >Added theme keyword "polygon" to added theme keyword thesaurus "FGDC" >Added ISO 19115 Topic Category keyword >Added LCSH theme keywords >Added GNS place keywords >Replaced Tufts as the distributor >Exported metadata
